评论概述: Runs small but larger size is beautiful
评论详情: According too the size chart I needed a size medium (which is my normal size).  It was very form fitting and showed all my lumps and bumps.  It fit snuggly into my arm pits.  The picture shows the model wearing a longer and loose fitting shirt so I returned it for a large.  Fits just as I wanted it to and I love it.  The little peek-a-boo opening on the back is so cute.  You can see on the model that her little opening actually is baggy so she's obviously wearing a larger size than normal.  If you are in great shape and like a snug fit, order your correct size.  If you prefer not to show your imperfections, think about ordering up.  It's comfy, a cool fit and works well when I'm active.

评论用户: I love this product it works great
评论详情: Love my shirts Sizes fit perfect love fabric, washable flattering

Overall I like this shirt. Works great for workouts and wicks sweat away.  Does run a tad small, so order one size up if you don't want a snuggly fit. Looser around the middle, which is a plus for me. Only issue I had was the "black" color looks more like a charcoal gray. I've now ordered purple and blue so hopefully they will look better.
This top is great for a workout, especially if you have to run errands afterward! Cool and comfy but also really cute!

So excited to receive this top, ordered it in several colors as I thought it would make a nice summer top and could also do "double duty" as a workout top. Top, fabric and style are great, sizing way off. I am typically the same size across the board from most manufacturers, but this top I could barely get over my head. If you are an XS or SM you might be able to size up abt 3 sizes to get a top that will fit, but if you are a Med or larger then this top probably won't work for you because you need to size up 2-3 sizes and there are not enough size options left in the range to do that. On the plus side, I did order a similar closed back, t-shirt style top from this  same manufacturer in same size, which I'm looking forward to receiving as a different style may fit better. We'll see. Hope this helps.
Love the fit and quality of this shirt. It feels good and is very comfortable during hot yoga. Recommend.
This is a very well made and comfortable top.  I love the color and the fit.
Very small for a medium. Will need a large or XL. It looked flowy in the photo, but is not at all flowy in the size I got. I usually wear a medium.
This is a pretty blue workout top, but the straps in the back didn't fit right.
Stitching on this product is solid and fits well.
I get many compliments on this shirt.  Very comfortable and versatile wear it for exercise and also with casual slacks.
Very complimenting
I wear this too to the gym - feels and fits great.  Long enough but not too long.
Love the color and the way it is made at the front at neck

Ordered large in several colors. They fit great. They are dry fit material. Can be dressed up or casual. I was expecting the red to be a dark crimson red but it is a little on the red/ pinkish with grey color. Still like them.
Color looks more like a dark gray.
The material and design are great. I got a medium and I guess I should've gotten a small because this swims on me. So much so that it doesn't look or feel right.
Ordered this in the size I would typically wear, really tight, we'll use it as a gift for someone else. Would question ordering it again.

评论概述: Not for those with a spare tire :)

It is also too long imo. But if you are long and lean, this would look great on you. For reference, I am 5'6", 150, 38C.
Yes
Seems to run a little smaller, could have used the next size up.  Feels more like a workout shirt but nice
I am 5’4”, 145 lbs., 36DD.  I wear for workouts, walking, yoga.  I plan to purchase other colors.

This is probably best suited as an exercise or yoga top, which I use it for, but is also nice enough to wear as an everyday casual top. It fits true to size. The color says purple, (and it also as a bit of black in it) but it's just reddish enough that it goes quite well with my burgundy yoga capri pants.

I like the style of this top but for me I found it to be a bit more fitting than I wanted for the gym plus a bit on the thinner side.  The stretch is good but just not for me.  I do love the back…I wear a L and should get an EX if I reorder….

I likd everything about it except the back was a little too low and shows my bra.  I love the feel and color most of the way it fit. I will need to take the shoulders up just a little, not a problem I can’t fix.

评论概述: Color is not the same as shown
评论详情: Cute shirt I’m a36c and got a medium fits perfect. But the shirt is not a dark purple as shown it’s more a light lavender color. The pink shirt I ordered like this was like the picture shows bright. Worth the money.
I’ve been wearing this to to do my Fitness+ workouts. Very comfy.

I bought this shirt in “purple/red” because it looks like a beautiful plum color online. In reality, it’s fuchsia/black, so heads up on that. Even though I’m not fond of this color, I kept it because I needed a workout shirt that day, and I’m ordering a second one. It’s comfy for working out, And the shape is fluttering because it flares a bit at the hips instead of cleaning to my tummy like other shirts. One thing to note is that the crisscross on the back does make a little bump on the upper spine, so if you do Pilates or something where you roll on your upper back, you will feel uncomfortable during that exercise.
I love the color and the way it is made. Amazon driver left my item at the front door. I told them where the back door is. Please follow instructions from now on!

I ordered 2 of these shirts and will be ordering more. The fit (I ordered a L) was perfect. The length of the shirt covers my hip area and I feel comfortable wearing the shirt with my leggings. I highly recommend this product and have shared it with a friend. You won’t be disappointed!
I normally wear a small and ordered a medium. It was way too big. Other than that it is a cute exercise top.
It does run a bit large.

When exercising, I really need a neckline that allows for better air flow.  I wear this top for a fairly intense cardio workout. While I like the length of it, it’s a bit snug around the neck for me.  I bought a few same sized longer exercise tops at the same time and found the fit of this one a little tighter than the others.  Overall, I’m OK with it and will continue to use it.
Comfy top, great color, fits well and shipped quickly

评论概述: Great fit and soft to the touch

评论概述: For obese women, go up a size
评论详情: As a plus size woman who normally wears a size 20, I got the 2x because of the sie chart and "fits as expected" and I suppose it does for somone who is not obese. Even though the spandex is 6%, the 2x was a bit snug and hugged all the wrong places. I ended up getting a 3x I love this shirt! it is becoming my favorite shirt. It is now loose enough that it's comfortable and I don't feel so embarrassed to go out. and since I am losing weight, I'm keeping the 2x :)

评论概述: Love all three Kimmery tops I purchased!
评论详情: I ordered 3 Kimmery tops. All are well made with tight stitching. Length is perfect for covering backside while wearing leggings.

I'm 5'7", 200lb.  I bought this in a 2x and it fits perfectly in the shoulders, but it's just a bit tight across my belly.  I love the design and the fabric so I exchanged it for a 3x.  (Thank goodness for Amazon's return policy!)  The 3x fits acceptably, loose but it's not hanging off. My only complaint is that the opening in the back is so deep that my bra shows.  I could wear a different one but I bought the shirt for golf and wear a sports bra when I play.  Guess I'll have to buy a prettier one :)

评论概述: The only problem is the color.
评论详情: I like the top and will be keeping it. The material is soft and light, long enough to cover my butt, and has a flattering fit. I ordered an extra large as suggested by the sizing chart and it fits well. I may go up to a 2X with my next one just for a little extra room when working out. But… I agree with many of the other reviews. The tag is super scratchy and I carefully cut it out immediately. I was very disappointed with the color. This seems to be consistent throughout other reviews with many of the colors. I ordered purple and it is absolutely not purple but very blue as shown in my picture where I laid the shirt over purple and royal blue t-shirts. That’s not a deal breaker for me though so overall I do like it and will order a few more. I just won’t count on the color until I see it.
Size was great (I ordered a XXL) It will work great for Tennis.  I just wish there were more option of colors and maybe some prints.  But overall, I would buy it again and again.  Thank You
Very flattering and silky soft.  Hole in back is large enough that can feel the mat when laying down to work out.  Skin stuck to mat a little.
I would order a size up for comfort

I was looking for a workout to that was not too short when you move around and this was just the right length.  I love the variegated colors and the criss cross in the back.  I purchased the purple and the teal one.

评论概述: Kimmery Woman Short Sleeve Round Neck Criss Cross Back Yoga Shirt
评论详情: The shirt fit a bit smaller than the other 2 that I purchased even though I ordered the same size in all 3 shirts. I would order 1 size up for this shirt if you don't appreciate tight fitting tops.
I like it, it fits nice
I expected the fabric to be similar to most workout tops-light and silky. Instead it was rough and not at all soft. Also the size runs quite small.
Color & quality

I think it’s a lovely work out shirt. It’s pretty with out being to fancy, it’s just a work out shirt after all. I normally fit an XL but after I read all the mixed reviews,I decided to get a size up just Incase. I think they really are true to size cause the XXL was a bit lose. I think if I had gone with an XL it would have been a nice fitted work out shirt. The lose fit was still comfy too so I think I’ll keep it. I was worried about the fabric due to some review saying it poor or low quality but it’s actually quite nice. I have some dress shirts I use for work that are made from the same fabric and they’ve stood the test of time. Only time will tell how durable these are but I already want to get another color, and I did XD. Looks and feels better than I originally thought. ^_^

Fits great.  It is cute, and works great in my workouts.

I was so happy with this top that I ordered it in another color. The material is soft and I love the crisscross detail in the back. It's comfy for working out or just bopping around on a summer day. I sized up because I like tops to cover my backside, which this does (just barely).

I'm busy and this shirt hugs me nicely. I'm I'm DD, the size was lose enough to be comfortable. a lot of times athletic wear is boxy,  but due to the seaming at the bust, I find the fit really great for a curvy chick. moisture wicking athletic fabric works well as described and keeps me dry.
I love the shirt, it runs small so I had to order a different size.

It's a workout shirt so, sure it's snug, but this one's a little too snug for me. If you've got a really good support bra on for the Big Bertha's in the front, the cutesy cross cut-outs in the back ain't so cutesy anymore. Just saying...
Great fit

评论概述: Not the Same Quality and Fit as Before
评论详情: I have bought several of these Kimmery shirts in the past and really liked the fabric, cut, fit, etc, so I was excited to find new colors. Unfortunately, the newer version is made of a thinner, clingier fabric, which shows EVERY imperfection (even the outline of the seams of yoga pants or shorts worn underneath show through). In addition, the length is shorter than before, so, at least for me, forget about getting full coverage when wearing with yoga pants or shorts. :-/

Positives: I like how long the top is; I can wear it during yoga without it riding up. The back straps are cool. I ordered my usual exercise top size and it was on the roomier size but not too big.  Cautions: The purple color is darker than it looks in the photos. Also, the material is also heavier polyester. The weight was very noticeable compared to my breathable Nike and Under Armour running tops, or a light cotton yoga top.  Recommendation: I'm happy with the purchase but I won't be buying any more.
Cool

Love the top and everything about it, BUT...it looks like a pale pink in the picture and is advertised as pink. It truly IS NOT PINK. It is a peach. I was disappointed  as I really wanted the soft light pink as shown in the picture. I kept it anyway as the peach color is nice and I like the top. Amazon needs to change the color description to peach and try to get a photo of it in its TRUE color.
I bought one for my daughter and she liked so much I purchased another for her in a different color.

I bought two of these in different colors. Perfect fabric weight for covering up on the way to working out, but light enough to wear during class. I especially like the short sleeves; that's just my preference over tank style tops. Slightly rounded hem is flattering too.

I ordered variations of this top (different necklines, colors etc) in size medium and found them all to be boxy.  The shoulders and bust were ok, maybe a bit large, but there was no size small option to try.Since I ordered a few different tops I found that even two of the same style (in different colors) were of different length and boxiness.  For some reason the pink one was the smallest and tightest so I did keep it since I also liked the style with the crossing straps in the back.  Overall, it's okay but just meh.
I bought this shirt to go with yoga pants to exercise in. The material was too thin and made the shirt cling to my body. It looked nice when on a hanger!
